external_references.source_name: Twitter Cglyer Status Update APT3 eml
external_references.description: Glyer, C. (2018, April 14). @cglyer Status Update. Retrieved October 11, 2018.

objects.description: [APT3](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0022) has interacted with compromised systems to browse and copy files through its graphical user interface in [Remote Desktop Protocol](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1076) sessions.
